attributes.action: Bring in legeslation forcing a bi-election in constituencies where the standing MP defects from one party to another
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's have the right to switch party elegancies without the voter for whom they have been elected having any say whatsoever. In these cases I propose a bi-election should be held at the soonest possible opportunity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
